LanguageData.LTSChangeBag: Note: Settings will only be applied to newly created kits.
LanguageData.LTSHideMultipleGizmosDesc: Whether all kit gizmos should be hidden when more than one pawn is selected.
LanguageData.LTSUseWiderGizmoDesc: Whether to use the smaller gizmo without image (true) or the standard one (false)
LanguageData.LTSNoAmmoCategories: There are no ammo mods installed.
LanguageData.LTSNpcMaxAmmo: Minimum and maximum ammo pawns can spawn with: {0}% - {1}%.
LanguageData.LTSNpcUseAmmoDesc: If checked true, enemies and guests will consume ammo upon using their ranged weapons. If false, they don't consume any ammunition. (Do note, they will still need at least 1 useable ammo in their kit which can thus last indefinitely much like how companions work in skyrim.)
LanguageData.LTSPerBulletDesc: Whether firing a weapon consumes 1 ammo per bullet fired in a burst(true) or 1 ammo total per burst(false).
LanguageData.LTSSettingsSaveAsDefaultDesc: Saves to your mod config folder, the current ammuntion setup.
LanguageData.LTSSettingsLoadDefaultDesc: Loads from the config folder, the current ammuntion setup.
LanguageData.LTSDesignatorLootAmmoDesc: Loot ammo from corpses and the wounded.
LanguageData.LTSMessageMustDesignateLootable: Must designate corpse or downed character with a kit.
